casebody.data:
LANDERS, FRARY & CLARK, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. GRAND SILVER CO., Inc., Defendant-Appellee. No. 89. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Oct. 30, 1939. T. Clay Lindsey and George N. Robillard, both of Hartford, Conn., for appellant. Abraham Moscowitz, of New York City, for appellee.

Before SWAN, CHASE, and PATTERSON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
